title: Certifications
description: RM Spices is committed to delivering the highest quality spices. Our certifications reflect our dedication to food safety, quality, and ethical practices. We adhere to stringent standards to ensure our products meet global requirements and customer expectations.

items.name: BRCGS Food Safety
items.description: BRC Global Standard for Food Safety — ensuring compliance with international best practices for food quality, safety, and operational criteria.

items.name: USDA Organic
items.description: Certified Organic by the United States Department of Agriculture — verifying that our products are grown and processed according to organic standards.

items.name: FSSAI
items.description: Food Safety and Standards Authority of India — certifying that our products meet India’s national standards for food safety and hygiene.

items.name: HACCP
items.description: Hazard Analysis and Critical Control Points — a globally recognized system for managing food safety risks through preventive controls.

items.name: GMP Quality
items.description: Good Manufacturing Practices — ensuring that products are consistently produced and controlled according to quality standards.

items.name: ISO 22000
items.description: International Organization for Standardization — certifying that our food safety management system meets global standards for food processing and distribution.

qualityAssurance.title: Quality Assurance
qualityAssurance.description: Our quality assurance process begins with sourcing from trusted farmers and continues through rigorous testing and inspection at every stage of production. We employ advanced techniques to ensure purity, freshness, and adherence to our strict quality standards.

items.title: Sourcing
items.description: We source our spices from trusted farmers who follow sustainable and ethical practices.

items.title: Testing
items.description: Our spices undergo rigorous testing for purity, quality, and safety at every stage of production.

items.title: Quality Control
items.description: We adhere to strict quality control measures to ensure our products meet the highest standards.
